channel.title: Programming on Peter Theobald
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Peter Theobald

item.title: Dav2Mp4 Convert security cam DAV to MP4
item.description: Many security cameras export video in a proprietary format called DAV which is difficult to work with. I wrote this program to convert DAV videos into standard MP4 video.

item.title: Dave Says Thats Not Funny
item.description: Dave doesn’t think any of my jokes are funny. I keep trying but he always says the same thing, “That’s not funny”. So like all repetitive processes, I automated it. This page scrapes jokes from Reddit/r/Jokes and presents them here as texts to Dave.

item.title: Ghost Solver - Now in Clojure
item.description: My previous post was about a Python program to calculate the moves to guarantee a win in the puzzle word game ‘Ghost’. The algorithm was naturally recursive and felt ‘LISPy’. @pdlug has been telling me how writing in Clojure will expand my mind, make me more productive and hem my pants so this week I learned just enough Clojure (I already knew LISP) to re-write the Ghost game solver in Clojure.

item.title: Ghost Solver - In Which We Ruin a Great Game
item.description: My son showed me a new word game, ‘Ghost’, and I wrote a Python program to “solve” the game and find all winning sequences.
